message.content: {"id": "6656", "title": "Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller", "description": "", "OB": "The close button is supposed to stay on the same line as the label, regardless of the size of the view. However, when the view is resized to a smaller size, the close button moves down.", "EB": "This behavior is causing a usability problem as users are accustomed to the close button being on the same line as the label and located in the far right corner.", "SR": "Ensure that the close button remains on the same line as the label even when the view is resized smaller."}

origin.input_prompt:
